name: Cannon
description: A heavy barrel mounted on a wheeled carriage that fires iron cannonballs. It takes three actions to load, aim, and fire the Cannon: Load (action), Aim (action), Fire (action).

actionsToOperate.description: One creature uses its action to load the Cannon with a cannonball and gunpowder.
One creature uses its action to aim the Cannon.
One creature uses its action to fire the Cannon.
